overview.basic:
The Sultan of Naqala has just died, and his seat is vacant. The oracles foretold of strangers who would maneuvre the five tribes to gain influence over the legendary city-state. Invoke the old Djinns and move the Tribes into position, and the Sultanate may just be yours!
Bid to go first in a race to take the best moves. Carefully plot a course to move the tribes, claim lands for your own, and gain allies from the Assassins, Elders, Merchants, Builders and Viziers, and invoke mighty Djinns to your cause.
